title: Register internal dashboard routes in frontend/src/App.tsx (no refactors)

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/App.tsx` to register new TanStack Router routes for the existing dashboard pages, without changing or removing any existing routes, router structure, or other code. Add the new routes only by (1) adding imports if missing and (2) adding new `createRoute({ ... })` definitions, and (3) appending the new route variables into `routeTree = rootRoute.addChildren([ ... ])`.

quotes: Tambahkan routing dashboard berikut ke dalam file: frontend/src/App.tsx
Jangan mengubah routing yang sudah ada. Jangan menghapus apa pun. Jangan refactor. Jangan improve. Jangan ubah struktur router.
Hanya tambahkan route baru di bagian routeTree = rootRoute.addChildren([...]).
Gunakan component dashboard yang sudah ada sesuai nama file masing-masing. Jangan buat component baru.

acceptanceCriteria: Only `frontend/src/App.tsx` is changed; no other files are modified.
Existing imports, routes, and router setup remain unchanged except for adding necessary imports and new route definitions.
New routes are added only as additional `createRoute` constants and included in `rootRoute.addChildren([ ... ])` (no router refactor).

requirements.text:
Add routes with the exact paths below, each mapping to the existing dashboard component (default export) from the corresponding file:
- `/superadmin/dashboard` -> `SuperadminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/superadmin/SuperadminDashboard.tsx`
- `/admin/dashboard` -> `AdminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx`
- `/asistenmu/dashboard` -> `AsistenmuDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDashboard.tsx`
- `/concierge/dashboard` -> `ConciergeDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDashboard.tsx`
- `/strategicpartner/dashboard` -> `StrategicPartnerDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/StrategicPartnerDashboard.tsx`
- `/management/dashboard` -> `ManagementDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/management/ManagementDashboard.tsx`
- `/finance/dashboard` -> `FinanceDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashboard.tsx`

If a component is already imported in `App.tsx`, do not modify that import; if it is not imported, add an import line only (no other import changes).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to each of the 7 listed paths renders the corresponding existing dashboard component instead of the 404 page.
The route `path` strings match exactly the requested paths (including leading slashes and spelling).
No new dashboard components are created and no existing dashboard files are edited.
All new route constants are included in the `routeTree` children array (appended without removing existing entries).

constraints: Do not modify or remove any existing routes in `frontend/src/App.tsx`.
Do not refactor, reorganize, or "improve" the router structure; only add what is necessary to register the new routes.
Do not touch any other files besides `frontend/src/App.tsx`.
If an import already exists, do not change it; only add missing imports.
nonGoals: Implementing any new dashboard UI or logic.
Adding authentication/authorization checks for these routes.
Changing existing 404 page text/copy or styling.
